entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Confusing error for missing workload set requested in global.json #40297
  • Notification of newer workload versions available isn't displayed with versions installed through Visual Studio #40295
    8.0.3xx
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack #40293
  • GLIBC_PRIVATE not defined error in dotnet SDK when installed via snap #40272

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40294
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Stabilize branding for the SDK 8.0.300 #40290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2433578 #40289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Introduce static web asset endpoints and define compression endpoints #39636
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #40263
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add APICompat support for checking generic constraints #40230
    Area-ApiCompat
  • More workload set fixes #40266
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    Area-Tools
  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • delete nonexistent feeds #40067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39786
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-enable a bunch of container tests #40191
    untriaged, Area-Containers
